title: Many Riddles (4U159)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	-1
Game Text:	Search. To play, exert an [Isengard] tracker. Plays on a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Assignment: Exert an [Isengard] tracker and remove (2) to assign that tracker to bearer. Bearer may exert to prevent this.
Lore:	”'It will be hard news for Frodo….'”
Rarity:	U
